Body: Possible Duplicate:  How can I control both volume and track skip on my Android device from my headphones?  So I had recently gotten the SIII and ditched the iPhone 4s. I have been using my Bose QC15 to listen to music and it has headphone controls but unlike the iPhone I cannot change the volume, switch songs (I can but it pauses more than switching) go back a song, fast-forward, or rewind with the headphone controls. I find it rather troublesome because I have to fish out my phone and get into the music app to do most of that. Any help on this?
Title: Headphone controls on SGS-III

history.Text: So I had recently gotten the SIII and ditched the iphone 4s. I have been using my Bose QC15 to listen to music and it has headphone controls but unlike the iphone I cant change the volume, switch songs (I can but it pause more than switching) go back a song, fastforward, or rewind with the headphone controls. I find rafher trounlesome because I have to fish out my phone and get into the music app to do most of that and its quite troublesome. Any help one this?

history.Comment: retagged, dropped ios, fixed up spellings, minor grammatical edits. pause > pauses, fixed title!
